skill.name: raffle-winner-picker
skill.description: Picks random winners from lists, spreadsheets, or Google Sheets for giveaways, raffles, and contests. Ensures fair, unbiased selection with transparency.
skill.summary: Picks random winners from lists, spreadsheets, or Google Sheets for giveaways, raffles, and contests...
skill.author: DYAI2025

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only documentation and prompt templates for AI-assisted random selection. No file access, network calls, or code execution capabilities.

content.user_title: Pick random winners from lists or spreadsheets
content.value_statement: Manually selecting random winners from long lists is time-consuming and prone to bias. This skill uses cryptographically secure random selection to fairly pick winners from CSV files, Excel spreadsheets, Google Sheets, or simple text lists.
actual_capabilities: Select random winners from CSV, Excel, or Google Sheets
Pick multiple winners with duplicate prevention
Export winner details with timestamp verification
Support weighted probability based on entry counts
limitations: Does not access external APIs without user-provided credentials
Cannot verify contest eligibility rules automatically
Results depend on data quality in source files
No built-in email notification to winners

use_cases.title: Social media giveaways
use_cases.description: Export form responses and fairly select winners from subscriber giveaways with transparent documentation

use_cases.title: Event raffles

use_cases.title: Random team assignments
use_cases.description: Randomly split participant lists into teams for classrooms, training sessions, or group activities

prompt_templates.title: Simple winner from list
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick a random winner from this list: [paste your list]

prompt_templates.title: Google Sheets selection
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick a random row from this Google Sheet for a giveaway: [Sheet URL]

prompt_templates.title: Multiple winners
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick 5 random winners from entries.csv, make sure no duplicates

prompt_templates.title: Winner with runner-ups
prompt_templates.prompt: Pick 1 winner and 3 runner-ups from the list, display all details

output_examples.input: Pick a random winner from this Google Sheet for a giveaway: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/example

best_practices: Export your complete entry list to CSV or Google Sheets before starting
Document the selection process with timestamps for transparency
Pick runner-ups in case the primary winner is ineligible
anti_patterns: Using for illegal gambling or lottery purposes
Trusting the skill to verify contest eligibility rules automatically
Sharing sensitive personal data without proper consent

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: CSV, Excel files, Google Sheets URLs, and plain text lists are all supported.

faq.question: How many winners can I pick at once?
faq.answer: You can pick any number of winners from 1 to hundreds. Specify the count in your prompt.

faq.question: Can I integrate with my Google Sheets?
faq.answer: Yes, simply share the sheet URL and the skill can access it if you provide appropriate permissions.

faq.question: Is my data kept private?
faq.answer: The skill processes data locally through your AI. No data is sent to third-party servers.

faq.question: What if I need to verify the selection was fair?
faq.answer: The skill provides timestamps and selection method details. You can also request a seed value for third-party verification.

faq.question: How is this different from other random pickers?
faq.answer: This skill offers cryptographically secure randomness, duplicate prevention, runner-up selection, and transparent documentation.
